value.title: Compute and storage updates are available for mission-critical applications on Azure
value.excerpt: Microsoft has announced a host of capabilities for mission-critical workloads on Azure include optimizations to compute, storage, backup, management, development, and networking.

value.title: As China Rises, the US Builds Toward a Bigger Role in AI
value.excerpt: After decades of staying out of industrial policy, a Pentagon-appointed commission recommends more spending on research and support for US chip makers.

value.title: Azure Percept: Edge intelligence from silicon to service
value.excerpt: In today’s fast-paced world, there is often a need for instantaneous, real-time responses. Companies are finding the computing needed to support this 24/7 mentality generates staggering amounts of data, often from devices out in the physical world.

value.title: National Security Commission on Artificial Intelligence issues report on how to maintain U.S. dominance
value.excerpt: The National Security Commission on AI report makes recommendations ranging from 5G and China to immigration policy and civil rights.

value.title: How China’s synthetic media startup Surreal nabs funding in 3 months
value.excerpt: What if we no longer needed cameras to make videos and can instead generate them through a few lines of coding? Advances in machine learning are turning the idea into a reality. We’ve seen how deepfakes swap faces in family photos and turn one’s selfies into famous video clips.

value.title: AWS reorganizes DeepRacer League to encourage more newbies
value.excerpt: AWS launched the DeepRacer League in 2018 as a fun way to teach developers machine learning, and it’s been building on the idea ever since. Today, it announced the latest league season with two divisions: Open and Pro.

value.title: This AI-generated Daft Punk video is the perfect tribute to the electro pioneers
value.excerpt: Computer artist Glenn Marshall paid homage to Daft Punk by using AI to produce a music video for the duo's 2001 track "Voyager."

value.title: Skydio hits billion-dollar valuation for autonomous drone tech

value.title: Deep Nostalgia: 'creepy' new service uses AI to animate old family photos
value.excerpt: Service from MyHeritage uses deep learning technique to automatically animate faces

value.title: Underwater robot rises from the depths to save drowning swimmers
value.excerpt: Even though lifeguards are essential to maintaining safety at swimming pools, they can't always see everything that's happening, nor can all pool operators afford to pay their salaries. That's where a new swimmer-saving underwater robot is designed to come in.

value.title: Documents Show Agreements Between CBP and JetBlue for Facial Recognition Boarding
value.excerpt: The documents provide more insight into the dynamics between DHS and airlines, which are increasingly deploying biometric boarding at their gates.

value.title: How to drive brand awareness and marketing with natural language processing

value.title: How Online Privacy Issues Will Shape Future Use Of Artificial Intelligence In Advertising
value.excerpt: The article discusses the use of artificial intellignece in advertising as a response to stricter privacy regulations in order to effectively target consumers while protecting sensitive information. Sheri Bachstein of IBM Watson is interviewed.

value.title: Codeacademy partners with Black and Brilliant for 10-week AI course
value.excerpt: The two organizations are hoping to increase diversity within the artificial intelligence field and prevent AI bias.

value.title: Only 50% Of Hires Are Successful: How AI Is Optimizing The Experience
value.excerpt: Organizations need to have processes to handle the increased number of applicants the best way possible, especially for industries that had to let go of many employees, to recruit the best candidates.

value.title: Avoiding Bias And Discrimination In Machine Translation
value.excerpt: Bias and discrimination have appeared time and again in various technological forms. A pressing issue is the discrimination found in many of the translation applications in use today, as Google Translate alone now serves roughly 200 million people daily.

value.title: Marketers: Make Artificial Intelligence Reflect Your Values — Not Undermine Them
value.excerpt: A few measures can help reduce the risks and raise the odds that AI can help you strengthen and better communicate your values.

value.title: Healthcare Revolution In The Platform Economy
value.excerpt: If there is any industry worthy of platform innovation and disruption, it’s the healthcare industry. Advancements in inpatient care, unit productivity and service accessibility can be the difference between life and death.

value.title: Deep learning-based splice-AI can help predict the onset of Alzheimer's disease
value.excerpt: Korea Brain Research Institute (KBRI, President Suh Pann-ghill) announced that the research team led by Dr. Jae-Yeol Joo discovered new cryptic splice variants and SNVs in PLCg1 gene of AD-specific models for the first time using Splice-AI.
